name: MindGenius XML Map File
summary: Mind map created by MindGenius business diagramming software; saves a diagram such as a brainstorming chart, project plan, or a flowchart; used for storing presentation materials as well as for creating business documentation; can be exported to a variety of document formats, including PowerPoint ( .PPTX ), Visio ( .VSD ), and .PDF formats.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
